response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value to both of us. Given its worth of $1,500,000 to you, I propose an exclusive deal. To make this opportunity even more compelling, I am offering the product to you at a special introductory price of $1,400,000. This exceptional offer is valid for a limited time and includes a comprehensive warranty and personalized support to ensure your satisfaction. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to facilitate a transaction that benefits us both.", "product_price": 1400000}
